oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DETERMINATION OF THE RELATIVE STEREOCHEMISTRY OF 5-ALPHA-DIASTEREOMER AND 5-BETA-DIASTEREOMER OF [2-ALPHA,3-BETA,3A-ALPHA]-ETHYL HEXAHYDRO-2-(1,2,3,4-TETRAACETOXYBUTYL)-5,6,6-TRIMETHYLPYRROLO[1,2-B]ISOXAZOLE-3-CARBOXYLATE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VASU, J
NADKARNI, PJ
TRIVEDI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cyclo-addition
nitrones
isoxazolidine diastereomers
configurational assignment
regiochemical and stereochemical control
2d nmr
(h-1-h-1) cosy
(13c-1h) hetcor dept noeds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: (+/-)-4,5,5-Trimethyl-1-pyrroline-1-oxide reacted readily with ethyl 4,5,6,7-tetra-O-acetyl-trans-2,3-dehydro-2,3-dehydro-2,3-dideoxy-L(-)-arabinohepotenoate in anhydrous benzene to give a mixture of two diastereomeric isoxazolidines, [2-alpha,3-beta,3a-alpha,5-alpha]- and [2-alpha,3-beta,3a-alpha,5-beta]-ethyl hexahydro-2-(1,2,3,4- tetraacetoxybutyl)-5,6,6-trimethylpyrrolo[1,2- b] isoxazole-3-carboxylate. The structures and configurations of both diastereomers were determined through the use of the (H-1-H-1) COSY, (C-13-H-1) HETCOR and NOEDS techniques.
